reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater cute, soft, and comfortable, with good quality and nice colors. The fit receives mixed feedback - while some say it fits well, others mention it slides off the shoulders. The sizing is also mixed, with several customers noting it runs slightly oversized. The flattering aspect gets mixed reviews, with some finding it flattering while others say it doesn't look flattering.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars JUST PERFECT
items.body: Beautiful sweater. Soft, well made. Read more
items.author: Megan

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars She loved it!
items.body: Managed to get the fit just right, and she said it felt comfy to wear. The white was thin enough to see underneath, so plan on layers. Overall, she's very happy. Read more
items.author: Jake of Many Names

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Soft but thin
items.body: This is a very soft top, but the knit is large and fairly see-through. I ordered this in my normal size and it fits well, but does not hang off the shoulder. It looks fine without hanging off-shoulder though, so that's not a negative, just noting for those wanting it to hang. I'd imagine a larger size would give you more of a look like the model shows. A down side for me is that though the sweater is very stretchy, the waist band is not at all. Putting it on, I worry if I pull it a bit too far the threads will break. So far it hasn't done that, but I can see how it would be easy to do. The sewing matches the lines up on the sides and sleeves, which is a plus! Overall, cute and very comfy top! Read more
items.author: SSbuni

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super soft and warm!
items.body: This sweater exceeded my expectations! It is super soft! I got compliments on it at a Christmas party I wore it with a silk brown skirt. I felt very beautiful in it. It looks like I can wear this work jeans, or leggings as well dressed up or down! Recommend! Read more
items.author: Angelina

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Material and sizing varies per color variant!!
items.body: I bought this in two colors: "2-grey" and "1-red-wine" The grey one was HUGE and made of 100% acrylic. I returned the size i got for a smaller one and was happy enough with it to order the red wine one. This one was about two sizes smaller, though labelled the same as the grey one. Material was also thinner and softer - an acrylic/polyester mix rather than all acrylic. I suspect there is evern more variety between color choices but unless you are lucky, be prepared to do some returns to find the right size. The grey one I kept and I can see it beginning to fuzz and pill within the first wearing ... which isnt surprising with anything acrylic... Read more
items.author: AB

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Very cheap quality
items.body: Horrible quality. My daughter tried it on. We gently washed it and it ended up with multiple holes in it. Never even got to wear it. Awful. Read more
items.author: Haydoo

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect size
items.body: This shirt is beautiful it fits just as I like, once I wear it I’ll update with pictures. Read more
items.author: La Tonya K. Franklin

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Shows off my tattoos
items.body: It fits great! I love how it shows off my neck & shoulders. Read more
items.author: Katharine

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Off Shoulder is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Off Shoulder is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: 1-light Pink, 2-apricot, 4-black, 1-apricot, 2-green, 6-white, 4-khaki, 01-white, 1-purple, 1-black, 1-light Blue, 3-light Pink, 1-green, 4-white. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
